descriptionHtml:
The previous version got a wrong texture directory.  It\'s fixed and now the texture should be showed correctly in game.

And I found another problem with it:

when use the Favemenu mod, this item is listed in Misc instead of weapons, i\'m looking for a way to fix it.
_____________________

This sword contains 28 physical base dmg and 20 fire damage on hit, 3000 charges which each hit will cost 50.  so 60hits.


2 ways to obtain it:

A.~ Open Console, type in \"Player.additem 02001000 1\"

B.Go to skyforge with smithing 100 i guess, bring 1 glass sword, 15 ebony ingot and 15 refined moonstone

The item ID might go conflict against other mod, im still looking for a solution to fix that.
author: RemoteCrab131
